title: Barclays Premier League Dashboard
description: Created a dashboard website to show team-wise match data of all the clubs that played the league between 2006 and 2018. Used Spring Batch to format and convert a Kaggle dataset to a HyperSQL (in-memory database) database instance. Created REST APIs using Spring Boot and developed UI components using ReactJS which consumed the APIs to show data. A consolidated build of React and Spring boot was hosted on the cloud using AWS Beanstalk.

title: Novelist - Book Tracking App
description: A book tracking web application developed using Spring Boot Framework of Java and Apache Cassandra (DataStax Astra) NoSQL database which helps users track their book reading, update reading status and rate the books. The dataset for book tracking from the Open Library has been reduced to smaller size for testing purposes however, this application uses Open Library Web API to allow users to search any book in the world. Apache Cassandra offers high performance and scalability to this project. Thymeleaf templating engine is used to create simple UI along with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. Spring Boot is the backend technology connecting to the Web APIs and the database.

title: To-Do List
description: This is a To-Do Single Page Application created using React, JSX, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. Users can add a title and description of to-do items which will show up as a list below on the same page. Once completed, the item can be marked complete. This application uses a Javascript feature called localStorage to store and retrieve the added data from the browser memory itself.This data is persistent across multiple sessions until browser memory is not cleared.

title: Emotional Assistant Powered by Artificial Intelligence
description: A conversational AI-based chatbot designed to interact with people suffering from various mental illnesses such as Depression, OCD etc. and analyze their sentiments along with handling positive conversations with them. In parallel, the chatbot prepares a graphical representation of the analysis and shares it to the concerned medical practitioner for medical visibility and intervention, thereby bridging a gap between patient and doctors.

title: Face-Recognition Based Attendance Manager
description: This is a face detection & recognition application to automate attendance management using Computer Vision and OpenCV library (Python). This requires pre-capturing of the attendees pictures with the help of which it trains its Machine Learning model to predict the users later on whenever required. It is capable of detecting multiple people in a single frame.

title: Blabbershare - Blog
description: A simple blog made using Django Framework of Python and PostgreSQL database on the server-side along with HTML/CSS and Bootstrap framework on the client-side. This blog allows users to authenticate against credentials and post random blogs and pictures.

title: Solus Night - 2D Adventure Platformer Game
description: This is a simple 2D-Platformer game designed for Windows OS using C# scripting and Unity3D game engine. It comprises of few small levels incorporating a linear game level design. The game is published on Itch.io
